title: I cant login
body:
I get a message that says Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may have caused this error can be found here.

Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page.

replies.body: If you're still experiencing this issue, it may indicate a network issue that's being blocked from connecting to the login servers.  Go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get that fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

I was getting these errors, set it up to run with administrative privaleges, see if that helps

Although around the time this was posted I started getting a 200+ ping in games, with others reporting in excess of 500. There might be an issue in the network somewhere

same here, I was playing a custom game then It got laggy and started to reconnect me, once I was done my client wasn't connected to pvp.net
I restarted the client and know i get your same issue when I try to log in =[
same story here. i just downloaded LoL on a new computer and went through all the troubleshooting steps, and some others recommended online and nothing worked...
